title: Encoding
description: Specifies serialization details for multipart request body properties, including content-type, headers, and encoding style. Handles complex content negotiation. Note: a Content-Type header placed in the Encoding object's 'headers' map is ignored â€” use the 'contentType' attribute to set the MIME type for a multipart section.

style.description: Serialization style for the encoding (only applicable to multipart/form-data and application/x-www-form-urlencoded)

allowReserved.description: Allows reserved characters in field values without percent-encoding. Only applies when style is 'form' and the content type is 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'.
